front.title: Definition of IANA Registry for Timezone Names

abstract.t: VCards need a stable, well defined list of timezone names, so that users can create VCards that refer to timezones. There is no common list of such names, and other standards need timezone names also. This document creates an IANA registry of timezone names, and initially populates the list.Initial version o Define timezone registry. o Defer initial population with Olsen database until we like the basic document.
